titleInfo.title: Screening masses close to the chiral phase transition

mods.abstract: Evidence indicating that quarks are not confined inside mesons above the chiral transition is presented. Values are given for the effective four-fermion coupling between the quark and anti-quark above the chiral phase transition for both the pion and the rho meson.
